WorkItem.Description:
As mage sometime need to switch spec Fire and Arcane.
I have experience that I not need reenchant or regeming my gear. Only change some gear (for example trinket) and need reforge.
I meant that it is useful to have option in optimizer like Talents: Do'nt Change for:
Enchants : Do'nt Change
Gemming: : Do'nt Change
Â 
Now I must calculate manually and it working.

Comments.Message: Take a look at Batch Tools (http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=BatchTools), it's designed for exactly this situation.
I am very ashamed for my post, because I forgot the proverb "If all fail it is time to read manual".
